channel.title: Can't change ip in source
channel.description: So I just downloaded the server source and client. Made some changes but now I got stuck. I got stuck trying to change the ip on my source. What file do I need to edit to change the ip of my server. (already changed client ip. so just source ip please.)

item.title: Can't change ip in source
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Search for ‘server =’ in Client.java Client sided, use that…

Your server IP doesn’t change since it’s hosted local 99%.
The client connects to a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't change ip in source
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Erm… Most server’s don’t use a specific IP.
They bind to your IP address on port 43594, you do not specify it…
You just make the client connect to that IP, which you can find client sided, not server.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't change ip in source
item.dc:creator: @osbodav osbodav
item.description:
@osbodav wrote:

[quote=“daanoss9, post:1, topic:549596”]So I just downloaded the server source and client.
Made some changes but now I got stuck.
I got stuck trying to change the ip on my source.
What file do I need to edit to change the ip of my server.
(already changed client ip. so just source ip please.)[/quote]

the easiest way i found to change it is go in your search bar and type these in till you see something pop up. 127.0 or no-ip or 0.0.1 if those dont work type in port becouse usally the port is in the same section and the ip. and it client sided too. its usally in client.java or what ever your base is.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

its in gui or client
